core.name: Nebula Ward
core.description:
Leader Bonus:
Nebula Ward: Team gains 32% Elemental DMG and takes 26% less Elemental DMG.

subskills.name: Nebula Ward
subskills.description: Team gains 32% Elemental DMG and takes 26% less Elemental DMG.

core.name: Combo: Star Arrow
core.description:
Launches spin kick and charging kick attacks after 3 consecutive kicks.
Spin Kick: 150% ATK of Physical DMG x3.
Charging Kick: 200% ATK of Physical DMG and knocks enemies back.

subskills.name: Switch: Star Flame
subskills.description: Switch entry unleashes a forward kick that deals 200% + 300% ATK of Physical DMG, stuns knocked-airborne enemies for 5s, and inflicts 5 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: QTE: Aerolite Impact
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered when an enemy is paralyzed. Unleashes a powerful whirlwind kick, dealing 3,563 Physical DMG + 240% ATK of Physical DMG. If the last hit of the QTE successfully hits the enemy, heals team for 100 HP.

subskills.name: Divine Penalty
subskills.description: When on standby, inflict Divine Penalty on a random enemy every 10s, dealing 1,103 Lightning DMG and Impairing the target to lower its DEF by 80.0% for 6.0s.

subskills.name: Quasar
subskills.description: Enters the battle automatically right before a teammate dies and recovers her HP by 600. Can only be triggered once per stage.

subskills.name: Divine Light
subskills.description: Switch entry dispels most debuffs from all characters and increases own DEF by 50.0% for 4.0s.

core.name: Valkyrie Refuge
core.description:
Activate divine energy burst to enter Holy Light mode.
Burst: Consumes SP continuously to increase ATK. Time Fracture is active throughout the Burst.
Holy Light: Once the sub-skill is activated, heals HP for the entire team every 0.5s.
At over 75 SP, consumes 20 SP to activate Ultimate and 10 SP/s afterwards. Duration: 60s or until SP is depleted, during which the SP consumption rate increases after 20s.

subskills.name: Healing Spring
subskills.description: Heals the whole team for 67.2 HP every 0.5s during Burst. Effective on summoned characters (illusions, etc.).

subskills.name: Weihwasser
subskills.description: Upon Burst, instantly heal the whole team for 320 HP.

subskills.name: Song of Alacrity
subskills.description: During Burst, the whole team gains 50% Move Speed and 30% Attack Speed.

core.name: Time Fetter
core.description:
Quickly cartwheels away to evade enemy attacks. Can be performed twice in a row.
Time Fetters: Triggers upon Ultimate Evasion. Knocks the attacker airborne and inflicts Time Lock for 4s. CD: 8s.

subskills.name: Frozen Time
subskills.description: Time Fetters lasts 8.0s and bleeds enemies, dealing 40% ATK of Physical DMG eevery 0.5s for 10s and inflicting 3 Bleed Trauma.

subskills.name: Nova Fissure
subskills.description: Ultimate Evasions heal the whole team for 30.0 HP.

subskills.name: Time Bender
subskills.description: Ultimate Evasion's effects can be triggered 1 more time(s). CD is decreased by 3.0s.

core.name: Meteor Kata
core.description:
4-kick attack sequence.
1st Sequence: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
4th Sequence: 300% ATK of AOE Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Comet Ward
subskills.description: Basic ATKs have a 15.0% chance of weakening enemies, decreasing their ATK by 70.0% for 4s.

subskills.name: Nebula Uplink
subskills.description: Basic attacks that score a crit have a 30.0% chance to heal the whole team for 50 HP.
